channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2023080171
item.description:
Report X-2023080171

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-19
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was notified of a leaking hazmat and secured it in a salvage drum. DescribePack: Upon inspection, two bottles had loose caps and soiled all four bottles and ate through the cardboard. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The loose caps were tightened to stop them from leaking.

item.title: Report X-2023070515
item.description:
Report X-2023070515

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-17
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER WAS TOLD TO RETRIEVE A HAZARDOUS MATERIAL PACKAGE THAT WAS LEAKING IN DOOR. RETRIEVED PACKAGE AND RETURNED TO THE PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER CAGE. RESPONDER TRIAGED OUTER PACKAGING AND THE CONTENTS. RESPONDER DETERMINED THE INNER CONTENTS HAD LEAKED AND SOAKED THE BOX.

item.title: Report X-2023071238
item.description:
Report X-2023071238

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE LEAKING PACKAGE WAS RESPONDED TO IN WEST PRIMARY AND RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. RESPONDER DISCOVERED THAT THE INNER BOXES WITHIN THE PACKAGE WERE LABELLED WITH LIMITED QUANTITY HAZMAT DIAMONDS, BUT NO CORRESPONDING HAZMAT DIAMOND WAS AFFIXED TO THE OUTER CARTON (NOR WERE THERE ANY OUTWARD INDICATIONS OF THE PACKAGE CONTENTS). SECTION 14 OF THE SDS FOR THE PRODUCT (MOPAR LIMITED SLIP ADDITIVE) LISTED THE PROUCT AS UN1760, CORROSIVE LIQUIDS, N.O.S., 8, II. RMP WAS NOTIFIED OF THE PACKAGE AND CONTACTED THE HMSC TO REPORT THE INCIDENT. PACKAGE IS BEING HELD FOR ADG COMPLIANCE. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER: 1ZB370310308714308

item.title: Report X-2023070228
item.description:
Report X-2023070228

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE LEAKING CLASS 8 PACKAGE (A PLASTIC PAIL WITH NO OUTER BOX) WAS FOUND IN DOOR. A SMALL AMOUNT OF LIQUID HAD LEAKED FROM THE VENTED LID CAUSING CORROSION DAMAGE TO THE UPS TRACKING LABEL AFFIXED TO THE LID. THE PACKAGE WAS RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING AND PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: RAPICIDE HAD A VENTED CAP AND NO PLASTIC BAGS ALLOWING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK DURING SORTATION. DescribePack: LEAK WAS ABOUT THE SIZE OF A STANDARD ONE GALLON MILK JUG. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT WAS PLACED IN PLASTIC TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA ON DISCOVERY.

item.title: Report X-2023070451
item.description:
Report X-2023070451

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-30
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED WET PACKAGE. DISCOVERED AN UNDECLARED FLAMMABLE LIQUIED WHILE TRIAGING AFFECTED PACKAGES. THE CONTENTS DID NOT LEAK, DURING REWRAP, PER SDS WAS A HAZMAT. ADVISED RMP WHO CALLED HMSC TO REPORT THE UNDECLARED. HMSC ADVISED THAT IT WAS AN UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2023070308
item.description:
Report X-2023070308

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO CALL TO A LEAKER IN DOOR, DONNED P.P.E. AND USED THE DECISION TREE. BACK IN PSC, RESPONDER DISCOVERED THAT ONE OF THE VINEGAR AFFECTED BOXES CONTAINED HAND SANITIZER AND THE INTERNAL BOX HAD A LIMITED QUANTITY DIAMOND LABEL UN1987 PG III. RESPONDER CALLED HMSC TO VERIFY UNDECLARED REPORT BASED ON HMSC FINDING.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The KAG West, LLC driver inadvertently opened a valve on the trailer prior to having the delivery hose connected to the storage tank. This allowed approximately 200 gallons of gasoline to be released. Northwest Hazmat responded to the scene and handled the remediation.

item.title: Report X-2023070244
item.description:
Report X-2023070244

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-12
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CLOSURE FAILED, CONTENTS AND PACKAGE PLACED IN TOTE. RESPONDER NOTICED TOTE, CHECKED A BOTTLE, NOTED THE CORROSIVE WARNING, CHECKED SDS, DISCOVERED ITEM MIGHT BE UNDECLARED HAZMAT. RESPONDER NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR. FURTHER INVESTIGATION SHOWED 3 PRODUCTS (CORROSIVE LIQUID, ACIDIC, INORGANIC, N.O.S, SODIUM HYDROXIDE SOLUTION, AND FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS) ALL UNDECLARED DMPS.

item.title: Report X-2023070185
item.description:
Report X-2023070185

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-10
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOADER DISCOVERED LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER RESPONDED, OPENED PACKAGE, CHECKED LEAKER, LEAKER WAS DMP. BOX PLACED ON SHELF. ANOTHER RESPONDER STARTED PROCESSING THE LEAKER. DISCOVERED 6 AEROSOL CANS, WITH NO LQ HAZARD LABEL ON BOX. NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR. UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCESS STARTED.

item.title: Report X-2023061379
item.description:
Report X-2023061379

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-17
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER DISCOVERED THAT THIS WAS A LEAKING CORROSIVE HAZMAT. THE LIQUID NEVER LEFT THE PACKAGE AND RESPONDER WAS ABLE TO GRAB THE PACKAGE AND LEAVE WITHOUT NEEDING OBSORBANT. RESPONDER DISCOVERED ONE OF THE LIDS WAS A LITTLE LOOSE AND DMP THE 4 GALLONS SINCE THEY WERE AFFECTED.
